title: The Inaugural Workshop of the Northeast Big Data Innovation Hub
desc: THE INAUGURAL WORKSHOP of THE NORTHEAST BIG DATA INNOVATION HUB Sponsored by  ELSEVIER The Hub will hold its first workshop on Wednesday, Dec.?16?at Columbia.? Speakers will include counter-terrorism expert? Michael Leiter , chief strategy officer at Leidos, a top U.S. defense contractor; and? Keith Marzullo ,? director of the Federal Networking and Information Technology Research & Development?program. An industry session will feature discussion of corporate data analytics and how companies in the Northeast might benefit from the Hub. A breakout session organized by leaders of the above sub-groups will focus on data available for sharing and plans for the coming year.? TICKET INFORMATION- UPDATED*   Due to space limitations, we may need to limit the number of representatives to 4 per institution. If we run out of space we will contact your institution. If you have any questions, please contact Brianne Cortese (bc2640@columbia.edu).  DETAILED AGENDA Please visit the workshop website for the detailed agenda.  http://northeastbdhub.dsi.columbia.edu/workshop.html Columbia Preferred Hotels Please be sure to call the hotel directly and ask about Columbia guest rates, which are subject to availability. (Distance from Columbia campus). DIRECTIONS AND PARKING MAP OF CAMPUS
